statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, body_temperature FROM patients WHERE body_temperature > 98.6
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM patients
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE body_temperature > 98 AND heart_rate < 60;
SELECT patient_name, age, contact_number, body_temperature FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, wearable_device_id, heart_rate FROM patients WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM HealthData GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, temperature FROM Patients INNER JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, temperature FROM Patients JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM Patients JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT device_type, manufacturer FROM monitoring_devices WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v1%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM doctor_profiles WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM doctor_profiles WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM monitoring_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple'
SELECT device_id, device_type, firmware_version FROM monitoring_devices ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wearables WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT p.patient_name, w.wearable_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN wearables w ON p.patient_id = w.patient_id WHERE w.last_update > '2022-01-01'

SELECT d.doctor_name, d.specialty, COUNT(m.log_id) AS num_logs FROM doctors d LEFT JOIN monitoring_logs m ON d.doctor_id = m.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name, d.specialty HAVING num_logs > 5 ORDER BY num_logs DESC

SELECT p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, m.log_time FROM patients p INNER JOIN monitoring_logs m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors d ON m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE m.log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY m.log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY device_type;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age;
SELECT h.device_id, h.timestamp, h.heart_rate, w.device_name FROM health_data h JOIN wearable_devices w ON h.device_id = w.device_id WHERE h.heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY h.timestamp DESC;

SELECT m.session_id, m.start_time, p.patient_name, s.staff_name FROM monitoring_session m JOIN patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN medical_staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id WHERE m.start_time > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY m.start_time ASC;

SELECT p.patient_name, w.device_name, h.timestamp, h.steps_count FROM patients p JOIN wearable_devices w ON p.patient_id = w.patient_id JOIN health_data h ON w.device_id = h.device_id WHERE p.age < 40 AND h.steps_count > 5000 ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
